# ElementOS Proprietary Files for Samsung Galaxy S20 FE (r8s)
# Minimal set of required blobs for functionality

# Modem firmware
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/modem.bin:system/vendor/firmware/modem.bin
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/modem_debug.bin:system/vendor/firmware/modem_debug.bin
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/modem_factory.bin:system/vendor/firmware/modem_factory.bin

# ISP firmware
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/isp_fw.bin:system/vendor/firmware/isp_fw.bin
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/isp_fw_2.bin:system/vendor/firmware/isp_fw_2.bin

# Audio firmware and config
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/wm1814_codec.bin:system/vendor/firmware/wm1814_codec.bin
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/wm1814_dsp.bin:system/vendor/firmware/wm1814_dsp.bin
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/audio_policy_configuration.xml:system/vendor/etc/audio_policy_configuration.xml
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/audio_effects.xml:system/vendor/etc/audio_effects.xml

# Sensors
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/sensors.ssc.so:system/vendor/lib64/sensors.ssc.so
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/sensorhub.fw:system/vendor/firmware/sensorhub.fw
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/sensorhub_patched.fw:system/vendor/firmware/sensorhub_patched.fw

# Camera firmware
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/camera_fw.bin:system/vendor/firmware/camera_fw.bin
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/camera_eeprom.bin:system/vendor/firmware/camera_eeprom.bin

# GPU firmware
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/mali_csffw.bin:system/vendor/firmware/mali_csffw.bin
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/mali_fw.bin:system/vendor/firmware/mali_fw.bin

# WiFi/BT firmware
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/bcmdhd_sta.bin:system/vendor/etc/wifi/bcmdhd_sta.bin
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/bcmdhd_apsta.bin:system/vendor/etc/wifi/bcmdhd_apsta.bin
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/bcmdhd_p2p.bin:system/vendor/etc/wifi/bcmdhd_p2p.bin
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/bcmdhd_mfg.bin:system/vendor/etc/wifi/bcmdhd_mfg.bin

# NFC firmware
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/nfc_fw.bin:system/vendor/firmware/nfc_fw.bin

# Fingerprint firmware
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/fingerprint_fw.bin:system/vendor/firmware/fingerprint_fw.bin

# GPS firmware
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/gps_fw.bin:system/vendor/firmware/gps_fw.bin

# DSP firmware
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/dsp_fw.bin:system/vendor/firmware/dsp_fw.bin

# Bootloader components (minimal)
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/sbl1.mbn:system/vendor/firmware/sbl1.mbn
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/rpm.mbn:system/vendor/firmware/rpm.mbn
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/tz.mbn:system/vendor/firmware/tz.mbn
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/hyp.mbn:system/vendor/firmware/hyp.mbn

# Keymaster firmware
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/keymaster_fw.bin:system/vendor/firmware/keymaster_fw.bin

# Widevine DRM
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/libwvdrmengine.so:system/vendor/lib64/libwvdrmengine.so
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/libwvhidl.so:system/vendor/lib64/libwvhidl.so
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/libwvstreamcontrol.so:system/vendor/lib64/libwvstreamcontrol.so

# Graphics
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/libGLES_mali.so:system/vendor/lib64/libGLES_mali.so
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/libEGL_mali.so:system/vendor/lib64/libEGL_mali.so
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/libGAL.so:system/vendor/lib64/libGAL.so
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/libVSC.so:system/vendor/lib64/libVSC.so

# Camera HAL
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/camera.device@1.0-impl.so:system/vendor/lib64/camera.device@1.0-impl.so
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/camera.device@3.2-impl.so:system/vendor/lib64/camera.device@3.2-impl.so
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/camera.device@3.3-impl.so:system/vendor/lib64/camera.device@3.3-impl.so
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/camera.device@3.4-impl.so:system/vendor/lib64/camera.device@3.4-impl.so

# Display HAL
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/display.qservice@1.0.so:system/vendor/lib64/display.qservice@1.0.so
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/hwcomposer.exynos990.so:system/vendor/lib64/hwcomposer.exynos990.so
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/gralloc.exynos990.so:system/vendor/lib64/gralloc.exynos990.so

# Audio HAL
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/audio.primary.exynos990.so:system/vendor/lib64/audio.primary.exynos990.so
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/audio.r_submix.default.so:system/vendor/lib64/audio.r_submix.default.so
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/audio.usb.default.so:system/vendor/lib64/audio.usb.default.so

# Bluetooth HAL
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/bluetooth.default.so:system/vendor/lib64/bluetooth.default.so

# Sensors HAL
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/sensors.exynos990.so:system/vendor/lib64/sensors.exynos990.so

# GPS HAL
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/gps.exynos990.so:system/vendor/lib64/gps.exynos990.so

# Power HAL
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/power.exynos990.so:system/vendor/lib64/power.exynos990.so

# Vibrator HAL
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/vibrator.default.so:system/vendor/lib64/vibrator.default.so

# Lights HAL
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/lights.exynos990.so:system/vendor/lib64/lights.exynos990.so

# Thermal HAL
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/thermal.exynos990.so:system/vendor/lib64/thermal.exynos990.so

# Fingerprint HAL
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/fingerprint.exynos990.so:system/vendor/lib64/fingerprint.exynos990.so

# NFC HAL
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/nfc_nci.default.so:system/vendor/lib64/nfc_nci.default.so

# USB HAL
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/usb.default.so:system/vendor/lib64/usb.default.so

# WiFi HAL
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/wifi.default.so:system/vendor/lib64/wifi.default.so

# Media codecs
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/libstagefrighthw.so:system/vendor/lib64/libstagefrighthw.so
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/libmediadrm.so:system/vendor/lib64/libmediadrm.so
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/libwvdrm_L1.so:system/vendor/lib64/libwvdrm_L1.so
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/libwvm.so:system/vendor/lib64/libwvm.so

# Neural networks HAL
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/android.hardware.neuralnetworks@1.0-service.exynos990.so:system/vendor/lib64/android.hardware.neuralnetworks@1.0-service.exynos990.so

# Neural networks driver
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/libnpu.so:system/vendor/lib64/libnpu.so
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/libnpu_engine.so:system/vendor/lib64/libnpu_engine.so
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/libnpu_hw_interface.so:system/vendor/lib64/libnpu_hw_interface.so

# TEE (Trusted Execution Environment)
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/libteeservice.so:system/vendor/lib64/libteeservice.so
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/libtee.so:system/vendor/lib64/libtee.so

# DRM
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/libdrmwvmplugin.so:system/vendor/lib64/libdrmwvmplugin.so
vendor/samsung/r8s/proprietary/libdrmtime.so:system/vendor/lib64/libdrmtime.so

# End of proprietary files list
